summary:
This mod changes the boring menu music to something a little bit more interesting.
You can choose from currently two different songs.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the boring menu music to something a little bit more interesting.
Currently the only options are [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HN0xmiZb9HA]Dragonborn - Bassboost by TekNemesisBeats[/url] and [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=reeG0qwDnkE]Fantasy Chorale by West One Music[/url]

[youtube]HN0xmiZb9HA[/youtube]     [youtube]reeG0qwDnkE[/youtube]

All credit goes to the authors of the music, and vikichan for [url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3159\"]MultiXWM[/url] which was used to convert the audio to XWM format.
author: kdude63

files.name: Fantasy Chorale by West One Music
files.fileName: Fantasy Chorale by West One Music-15898-1-0.zip
